short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Significantly improves YouTube comments by replacing them with random herps and derps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I loathe YouTube comments. Here’s a simple browser extension to convert them to ‘herp derp’. If you insist on reading the original (which is highly discouraged), click the comment.
